translations: 证明，证据；遗嘱，遗言；（人与上帝间的）圣约；（基督教的）圣约书（Testament）

sentences.sentence: This is the last will and testament of...
The falsification of the testament [will] was discovered by them.
sentences.translation: 他们发现这份遗嘱被窜改了。

sentences.sentence: It's a set of images that couldn't be more foreign or more alien to the prophetic mode of the old testament prophets.
sentences.translation: 这是一组不能再背离旧约先知的形象的一组比喻了。
